property.name: description
property.value: Locate the treasure. Toggle active on map to mark on your compass.

property.name: offer
property.value: Dwall here, I am leaving this note here hoping that one day someone will find this. That day has come apparantly, unless zombies can read. Attached is a map to some hidden treasure I left burried just in case I needed later on. I don't, so as far as I can tell, you are most deserving. Good Luck

property.name: description
property.value: Missing Medical Supplies. Attached is a map of its last known spotting. Good Luck

property.name: offer
property.value: Attached is a map to the last known where abouts of the missing Health Supplies. Find it and it's yours!
